# Revised Proposal: Smoke Test Architecture — Required Output Sections

## Changelog & Critique Response

Before presenting the revised proposal, I want to address each critique transparently.

### What Changed and Why

**1. Rollback/Gate Contradiction (raised by both gemini and grok) — ACCEPTED, FIXED**

Both critics correctly identified a genuine logical contradiction [EVID-1]: Section 3.1 defined rollback triggers as "any P0 test case fails (ST-001, ST-002, ST-003)" while Section 4.2 defined FAIL as "any hard gate fails," and hard gates included G4 (ST-004 + ST-005), which were classified as P1.
